overview: Mishima, who aspires to become a film director, is no longer able to endure his life of uncertainty. On the other hand, Watanabe, who is the only person who has a close relationship with his girlfriend Kay, is sincerely facing reality and living day by day. Mishima feels pressured by Kay's support. Gradually, he begins to wish to escape from reality. Then Mishima meets a woman named Mary Lou, who takes her to a club called THE ROMANTIC CLUB. It is a secret club where one can escape from the suffering of reality. Where will Mishima, who has turned away from his time of surrender and run away without fighting reality, go? Is this reality or delusion? Involving reality and delusion, this is the first, last, and greatest escape of youth.
title: The Romantic Club
